info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 2:07PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Moderate to heavy snow. will impact portions of southeastern Broadwater, south central Meagher, northeastern Madison, southeastern Jefferson and Gallatin Counties through 300 PM MST... At 205 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking Moderate to heavy snow along a line extending from 21 miles northeast of Manhattan to 10 miles northwest of Ennis. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Moderate to heavy snow. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Reduced visibility down to a half mile and slippery roads. Locations impacted include... Bozeman, Belgrade, Three Forks, Manhattan, Pony, Harrison, Norris, Mcallister, Bozeman Hot Springs, Gallatin Gateway, Missouri Headwaters State Park, Logan, Maudlow, Amsterdam, Four Corners, Church Hill, Willow Creek, Menard, Madison Buffalo Jump State Park, and Trident. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Slow Down and watch for changes in visibility and road conditions.
